15#ifndef DNS_KEYFLAGS_H
16#define DNS_KEYFLAGS_H 1
17
18/*! \file dns/keyflags.h */
19
20#include <isc/lang.h>
21
22#include <dns/types.h>
23
24ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
25
26isc_result_t
27dns_keyflags_fromtext(dns_keyflags_t *flagsp, isc_textregion_t *source);
28/*%<
29 * Convert the text 'source' refers to into a DNSSEC KEY flags value.
30 * The text may contain either a set of flag mnemonics separated by
31 * vertical bars or a decimal flags value. For compatibility with
32 * older versions of BIND and the DNSSEC signer, octal values
33 * prefixed with a zero and hexadecimal values prefixed with "0x"
34 * are also accepted.
35 *
36 * Requires:
37 *\li 'flagsp' is a valid pointer.
38 *
39 *\li 'source' is a valid text region.
40 *
41 * Returns:
42 *\li ISC_R_SUCCESS on success
43 *\li ISC_R_RANGE numeric flag value is out of range
44 *\li DNS_R_UNKNOWN mnemonic flag is unknown
45 */
46
47ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
48
49#endif /* DNS_KEYFLAGS_H */
50
